96474.text: Metric names for CSI and flexvolume drivers will include the driver name as well as the CSI plugin name.
96474.markdown: Metric names for CSI and flexvolume drivers will include the driver name as well as the CSI plugin name. ([#96474](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/96474), [@mattcary](https://github.com/mattcary)) [SIG Instrumentation and Storage]
96474.author: mattcary
